meanings.definition: (adjective) meeting the necessary standards for safe flight
meanings.sent1: The new plane was deemed airworthier after passing all safety tests.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic ensured the aircraft was airworthier before takeoff.
meanings.sent3: The pilot joked that only airworthier planes could handle his expert flying skills.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence in the airworthier aircraft soared as she gazed at the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The airworthier wings of the plane gleamed in the sunlight, ready for takeoff.

meanings.definition: (noun) a person or thing that is deemed safe for flight
meanings.sent1: The inspector checked the aircraft to confirm it was an airworthier.
meanings.sent2: The airline only trusted airworthier for their important flights.
meanings.sent3: The little boy proudly declared his toy plane as the airworthier in the whole room.
meanings.sent4: The vintage aircraft stood out as the airworthier among the collection.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's suit was the airworthier for the mission to space.
